Requirement Description: "The system shall determine an answer to a question as a correct if the keywords provide a 90% match and return the answer"
"The system shall exclude any number value from match code and provide the values to generator function (if one exists)"
"If the system does not detect a question mark at end of the string it shall return ""Was that a question?"""
"The system shall break a question down into words separated by space"
"The system shall answer questions that begin with one of the following valid question keywords: ""How""
"If the system does not detect a valid question keyword it shall return ""Was that a question?"""
"The system shall accept questions in the form of strings and attempt to answer them"
"The system shall respond to the question ""Who else is here"" with a list of users"
"When determining users the system shall connect to the server at ip address 192.168.64.3 port 1337 and sending a message ""Who?"""
"If a response is received from the server the user list shall be parsed from a ""$"" seperated list of users"
"If no response is received from the server the system shall return ""IT'S A TRAAAPPPP"""
"The system shall respond to the question ""Why don't you understand me"" with ""Because you do not speak 1s and 0s"""
"The system shall respond to the question ""Why don't you shutdown"" with ""I'm afraid I can't do that <username>"""
"The system shall respond to the question ""Where am I"" with the local git branch name or ""unknown"" if it can't be determined"
"The system shall respond to the question ""Where are you"" with the URL for the git repo or ""unknown"" if it can't be determined"
"The system shall respond to the question ""What is the <int> digit of the Fibonacci sequence?"" with the correct number from the fibonnacci sequence if the number has been found"
"When a valid match is determined the system shall return the answer"
"If the system has not determined the requested digit of the Fibonacci sequence it will respond with A)""Thinking...""
Requirement Method: B)""One second"" or C)""cool your jets"" based on a randomly generated number (A is 60% chance

Requirement Description: "The system shall accept and store answers to previous questions in the form of a string or a function pointer and store it as the generator function."
"The system shall provide a means of updating an answer to the previously asked question."
"The system shall respond to the question ""What is <float> feet in miles"" with the the float value divided by 5280 and append ""miles"" to the end of  the return."
"If no previous question has been asked the system shall respond with ""Please ask a question first"""
"The system shall accept and store answers to previous questions in the form of a string or a function pointer and store it as the generator function."
"The system shall provide a means of providing an answer to the previously asked question."
"If an attempt is made to provide an answer to an already answered question the system shall respond with ""I don\'t know about that. I was taught differently"" and not update the question"
"If no previous question has been asked the system shall respond with ""Please ask a question first"""
"When no valid match is determined the system shall return ""I don't know
"The system shall respond to the question ""Who invented Python"" with ""Guido Rossum(BDFL)"""
